title: Biden's Framework for Taxing Multinational Corporations
itunes:title: Biden's Framework for Taxing Multinational Corporations
description:
Dr. Anna Durbin, Professor of International Health at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health, discusses the safety surveillance of Covid-19 vaccines. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Businessweek Economics Editor Peter Coy talk about President Biden's efforts to keep corporations from dodging taxes. AppLovin CEO Adam Foroughi breaks down the innovation behind mobile gaming. And we Drive to the Close with Kelsey Berro, Fixed Income Portfolio Manager at JPMorgan Investment Management.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
